original: Lindholm, Klas Reinhold, kyrkoherde, Floby, f. 16/2/77 i Fyrunga, Skarab. J., av kommin. Gustaf L. o. Anna Sofia Holmgren. G. 11 m. Märta Wredling. Barn: Gustaf f. 12, Gunvor 14, Åke 18. — Stud:ex. 95, teol. fil. ex. 96, teor. teol. ex. 99, prästv. s. å. Tjg. i Eriksberg, Götene, Kin-ne-Kleva, Berg, Tived, Otterstad, N. Ving, Broddetorp, kommin. i Bottna-ryd 04, i Skölvene 07, kyrkoh. i Floby fr. 09. Ordf. i kyrkoråd, ordf. i Trevattna o. Hellestads barnavmdr. Skr.: I Mästarens tjänst, tidn :art. m. m. LVO 40.
translated: Lindholm, Klas Reinhold, clergyman, Floby, born on February 16, 1877 in Fyrunga, Skaraborg County, son of the curate Gustaf L. and Anna Sofia Holmgren. Married on November 11, to Märta Wredling. Children: Gustaf, born in 1912, Gunvor in 1914, and Åke in 1918. Completed his studies with a high school diploma in 1895, a bachelor's degree in theology in 1896, a theoretical theology degree in 1899, and was ordained as a priest the same year. Served in Eriksberg, Götene, Kin-ne-Kleva, Berg, Tived, Otterstad, N. Ving, and Broddetorp, as an assistant pastor in Bottnaryd from 1904, in Skölvene from 1907, and as a pastor in Floby from 1909. Served as chairman of the church council, and chairman of the child welfare committees in Trevattna and Hellestad. Wrote the book "I Mästarens tjänst" (In the Master's service), and various articles for newspapers. Received the Order of Vasa in 1940.
